ModMetaData.name: Dog Apparel
ModMetaData.description:
Are you missing protective apparel for your four legged companions? Don't hesitate longer! Have your fur babies protected from warcrimes. This mod will add textures for bulletproof dog vest which are cheaper and lighter in weight than animal flak amour. Equipment that will be added by this mod is listed below:
Dog Basic Harness
Dog bulletproof vest
Dog bulletproof vest with guard dog printed on it.
Bomb suit for dogs
IED detecting Dog vest
Cosmetic detective coat with matching detective hat for dogs.
